channel.title: Command Help
channel.description:
Hello, I need help making a command. I need the command to reset all your barrows kills back to 0. The reason I need this is because I used to have some of my ints going through barrows brothers, like ahrims was minigame points, ahrims was vls degrading.. So yeah..
-Pblord7

item.title: Command Help
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

Didn’'t work but I made a code and got it. Thanks tho.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("resetbarrows")) {
Barrows = 0;
Verac = 0;
Dharok = 0;
Ahrim = 0;
Torag = 0;
Karils = 0;
Guthan = 0;
}

Read full topic

item.title: Command Help
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

I need a command that resets your barrows kills, For example:

character-Ahrim = 18
character-Verac = 1
character-Dharok =1
character-Torag = 0
character-Karils =1
character-Guthan =1
Ahrims used to be = Souls Minigame Points
Veracs used to be = Vls Degrading
Karils use to be = 1st Login

Etc…

So I need something to reset these back to zero.

Read full topic
